name: Pollinating Kiss
outcome: {AttackerName} throws {AttackerHisOrHer} arms around {TargetName}'s neck and peppers {TargetHimOrHer} with small kisses, the sweet scent of nectar lingering on {TargetHisOrHer} lips.
miss: {AttackerName} tries to pepper {TargetName} with kisses, but {TargetHeOrShe} manages to avoid them.
statusOutcome: {AttackerName}'s kisses fill {TargetName}'s head with the sweet scent of flowers. {TargetName} is charmed!
